title: Liberty Skis Helix 89w - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Helix 89W. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 11 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

An all new ski enters the Helix family in a women-specific version.  We updated the tip and tail rocker so the ski butters with ease and will now ski the whole mountain much more capably.  Bamboo, poplar, and carbon fiber construction keep this ski lively and ready to rip any jump line.  The W means ‘wow.’

title: Liberty Skis Horizon 87 - 2026
body_html: New for 2026, the Horizon 87 is the narrowest ski in the Horizon line. Its slimmer waist and Variable Metal Technology offer an ideal balance of edge hold and maneuverability, perfect for those seeking precision on the slopes.

title: Liberty Skis Horizon 92 - 2026
body_html: The Horizon 92 brings quickness and confidence to your ride. With Variable Metal Technology underfoot for edge hold and dampening, combined with compliant tips and tails, this European-made ski is designed to inspire. It's time to upgrade from your old gear!

title: Liberty Skis Radian 92 - 2026
body_html: European craftsmanship meets Colorado design in the Radian 92. With easy turn initiation and the stability of Variable Metal Technology underfoot, this ski delivers a smooth, user-friendly ride. Try it for a day—you’ll be smiling from first chair to après.

title: Liberty Skis Radian 100 - 2026
body_html: The Radian 100 balances all-mountain versatility with big-mountain performance. Its lightweight yet powerful design offers incredible stability and control for a seamless ride, all crafted with European precision.

title: Liberty Skis Radian 106 - 2026
body_html: New for 2026, the Radian 106 is the ultimate one-ski quiver for bigger mountains with more snow. It's the wider, more powerful version of the Radian 100, providing superior performance across varied terrains with the same European quality and attention to detail.

title: Liberty Skis Scope 94W - 2026
body_html: Lightweight and playful, the Scope 94W is built for women seeking a liberating freeride experience. Poplar and ash, combined with a phenolic plate, offer excellent edge hold and performance in a lightweight package, while still remembering that skiing is all about the fun

title: Liberty Skis Scope 99W - 2026
body_html: Designed for women looking for a freeride ski that handles any terrain, the Scope 99W offers lightweight and nimble performance, with easy turn initiation, and rock-solid stability in carved turns, making it a highly user-friendly and fun ride.

title: Liberty Skis Scope 84 - 2026
body_html: An update for 2026, the Scope 84 now includes a 168cm size, making it perfect for juniors transitioning to adult skis. Its bamboo and poplar core and twin-tip design excel in parks, trees, bumps, and side hits.

title: Liberty Skis Scope 94 - 2026
body_html: The Scope 94 is your go-to freeride ski. A lightweight all-mountain twin, this playful and fun ski offers incredible versatility.  From side hits on groomers, to snaking through the trees, to park laps, the Scope 94 is up for anything.

title: Liberty Skis Scope 99 - 2026
body_html: The Scope 99 is the most versatile ski in our freeride line, ready for any terrain. With a 99mm waist, it excels at carving, floating, slashing, and just looking good. It’s perfect for anyone who wants a fun and intuitive skiing experience.

title: Liberty Skis Scope 104 - 2026
body_html: The Scope 104 is the new standard in big-mountain freeride skiing. Its nimble shape navigates technical terrain, while the Recoil Core Carbon adds stability and responsiveness for high-speed turns. Lightweight and powerful, it's perfect for any conditions.

title: Liberty Skis Scope 110 - 2026
body_html: For powder days, grab the Scope 110. This ski provides the float you need for deep snow while being light enough for backcountry adventures or a booter session. It handles groomers, tree stashes, and that open field of powder waiting for your signature effortlessly and with style.

title: Liberty Skis Scope 118 - 2026
body_html: The Scope 118 brings Liberty back to its freeride roots. Built with a poplar core and phenolic plate, its rockered tips and tails and high-carbon bases ensure a fast, fun ride through the deepest powder.

title: Liberty Skis Genome - 2026
body_html: When the snow is all-time deep, the Genome is your go-to ski. With a massive 141mm waist and perfectly placed rocker, it delivers effortless float and unmatched energy savings in deep snow. Perfect for unforgettable powder days from Steamboat to Niseko.

title: Liberty Skis Helix 89w - 2025
body_html: An all new ski enters the Helix family in a women-specific version.  We updated the tip and tail rocker so the ski butters with ease and will now ski the whole mountain much more capably.  Bamboo, poplar, and carbon fiber construction keep this ski lively and ready to rip any jump line.  The W means ‘wow.’

title: Liberty Skis Scope 94w - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Scope 94w. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 11 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

The all new Scope 94W smashes powder and crud with ease. The ski is lighter than previous models in Liberty’s women’s ski line.  Poplar and ash mixed with a phenolic plate under foot create a perfect blend of playfulness and edge hold. High-carbon race bases will keep this ski motoring on long cat tracks or places where you might need some extra juice. Our European-managed factory has set a new standard this year with this women-specific model.

 

Ski Essentials Review

"The Scope 94W is impressively light, playful, and creative—perfect for freestyle and freeride-oriented skiers. Its progressive rocker profile and positive camber underfoot deliver a unique blend of energy, stability, and responsiveness."

Watch Review ❯

title: Liberty Skis Helix 89 - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Helix 89. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 11 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

The pedigree feel of the Helix 88 now lives on in the new Helix 89.  Updated and increased tip and tail rocker give this ski a super playful feel.  The midsection of the ski stays moderately stiff so high speed arcs are made with ease.  Whether you are grabbing this ski for multiple park days or just looking for a narrower, all mountain tool the Helix 89 is your wing man.

title: Liberty Skis Helix 99 - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Helix 99. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 11 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

When you are looking to get the most technology for your money then look no further than the Helix 99.  Bamboo, poplar, carbon fiber and an ultra durable topsheet make this a holiday present nobody will ever forget. If you’re looking for a playful ski that will rip at any mountain in North America and beyond, this is your ski.

title: Liberty Skis Helix 99w - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Helix 99w. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 11 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

The new Helix 99w is a wider version of her counterpart, the Helix 89w.  More float for those certain parts of the country that demand it is just what this ski is made for.  Bamboo, poplar, and carbon fiber give this ski all the horsepower it needs.  The tip and tail rocker profile is unchanged from the original Helix 98 however we softened the tips and tails by about 10% to make them more playful than ever before.

title: Liberty Skis Horizon 92 - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Horizon 92. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 11 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

The all new Horizon 92 will leave you wondering why you waited so long to retire those skis from back in 2010.  Quick, nimble, and confidence-inspiring are feelings that we hear customers expressing after taking out the Horizon 92.  The titanal metal under foot gives the ski incredible edge hold and dampness while the tips and tails stay playful. Made in our European factory especially for you.

 


Real Skiers Recommended

"Skiers who love the sensation of a clean, unwavering carve will appreciate its capacity for spooling out an endless string of short-radius turns that never lose their intimate connection with the snow. If pressed to pigeonhole the Horizon 92 in a pithy profile, I’d call it a Power ski with excellent manners, like a personal valet. It’s preternaturally calm and composed, never calls attention to itself, does exactly as instructed and is always there when summoned."

Read Review ❯

 

Ski Essentials Review

"The Horizon 92 features a poplar and ash core, offering a stiff, stable feel while keeping the ski light and energetic. With a variable metal laminate, it provides great edge grip and smooth performance underfoot... It excels in short to mid-range turns, allowing it to handle crud and chop with ease."

Watch Review ❯

title: Liberty Skis Radian 100 - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Radian 100. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 14 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

The Radian 100 strikes the perfect balance of all-mountain performance and big mountain powder chasing. What we have found most exciting is the incredible stability that this ski maintains while also being lighter than comparable Liberty models of previous years. The Radian weighs in at approximately 100 grams per ski lighter than an Evolv100 in the same size.  Lightweight and increased stability? Sign me up.  European manufacturing is the icing on this all-mountain cake.

 

FREESKIER Editor's Pick 2024-25

"This ski loves carving. It adores big, fat railroad turns on super firm snow and also finds great stability in the moguls, with the energetic tail helping snap the ski around.” East Coast resorts and West Coast groomers, beware—the Radian 100 is coming for you."

Read Review ❯

 

Blister Gear Recommended 2024-25

"If you want a very quick ski that's fun to carve and outperforms it's width in fresh snow, the Radian 100 warrants consideration."

Read Review ❯

 

Real Skiers Recommended 2024-25

"An impressive entry in the 100mm-waist width category. This ski has a very stuck to the snow feel that is confidence-inducing in terms of speed control and resisting the earth’s gravitational pull while turning. Very predictable and at the same time versatile in turn shape and speeds."

title: Liberty Skis Radian 92 - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Radian 92. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 14 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

European manufacturing meets Colorado design with our Radian skis. The finish quality is beautiful which is one big reason why the Radian 92 has blown us away and has raised the level of Liberty free skis.  Easy turn initiation and ample stability under foot are the ingredients that make the Radian 92’s recipe so user friendly.  Ski the Radian 92 for a day and try not to smile at après, we dare you.

 

Powder7 Buyers Guide 2024-25

"For how easy it was to initiate turns and get on the shovels, this held a really good edge. Even though it’s not the most planted ski in the world, it was super reliable and predictable. I’d be pretty psyched to ski this every day."

Read Review ❯

 

Ski Magazine Review

"This ski is more refined and polished than any Liberty I’ve tested in the past. Polite, even. It was like a good swing dance partner, easing me into the turn, holding firmly when I needed it to, and then letting me out gracefully in time for the next. And when I was ready to really give ’er on the steep groomer Westside? It was there for me in spades."

Read Review ❯

 

Ski Essentials Review

"With a new and innovative build, these skis have a lot going for them when it comes to all-mountain prowess and power. The metal does its part by locking down the edges underfoot and keeping the tips and tails mobile and agile. This means that skiers who do not want the total dampness and power of a dual-metal ski will be a lot happier on the mid-level of the Radian 92."

Read Review ❯

title: Liberty Skis Scope 104 - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Scope 104. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 14 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

The Scope 104 is the new standard for big mountain freeride. Narrow enough for groomers or days with no new snow and wide enough for the days where you can't count the number of waist-deep turns you have made. Soft tips and tails allow the ski to easily find the best line down technical terrain and the phenolic plate under foot adds the stability needed for ripping high speed turns. You will notice the overall lighter weight of this ski and your legs will thank you for choosing the Scope 104.

 

FREESKIER Editor's Pick 2024-25

"It’s very different from anything Liberty has produced in the past. It’s lightweight and also very energetic, giving back the power you put into each turn. It skis well in the bumps, pow and groomers. I CAN’T GET ENOUGH!"

Read Review ❯

 

Blister Gear Recommended 2024-25

"It's definitely a viable option as an all-mountain-freestyle setup, but it should still be very intuitive for directional skiers who prioritize quickness and maneuverability."

Read Review ❯

 

Ski Essentials Review

"This ski feels like water pouring down the mountain—it follows the contours naturally and simply. There is no resistance to anything, it just goes where you point it. The flex of the ski, especially in the tips and tails, allowed for such easy turning and maneuverability."

Watch Review ❯

 

Ski Talk Review

"Looking for a 50/50 ski, backcountry or resort, this ski has you covered. Looking for a COMPLIANT ski, easy to turn at low speeds, and short radius turns."

Read Review ❯

title: Liberty Skis Scope 110 - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Scope 110. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 14 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

If it is snowing and accumulating, we are grabbing the all new Scope 110.  All of the float that is needed to ski from first chair to last you get on the Scope 110.  What I love about this ski is how incredible it is once you leave the sidecountry and re-enter the ski area. So fun on fresh groomers, tree stashes, and open powder fields, yet this ski is light, so the Scope 110 will make a perfect 50/50 backcountry-to-resort ski.

title: Liberty Skis Scope 84 - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Scope 84. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 11 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

The Scope 84 is the same as 2024’s Helix 84.  One notable update here is to add another key size, 168cm.  This ski is designed to be a tweener that is the perfect fit if kids’ skis are too small for a junior skier or if the skier's body weight does not yet warrant an adult ski.  The Scope 84 has a bamboo and poplar core and a full sidewall.  The twin tip shape makes this ski perfect for parks, trees, bumps, and side hits alike.

title: Liberty Skis Scope 94 - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Scope 94. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 14 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

The all new Scope 94 makes every day a new adventure.  Whether you are hiking Wild Child at Loveland or ripping groomers down Birds of Prey at Beaver Creek, the Scope 94 was the right ski to grab out of the garage.  We like to say that the skis in the Scope Series are our fun, freeride skis and that is exactly the emotion that the Scope 94 is known for, fun. Produced in our European-managed factory, this freeride ski will literally take you anywhere and everywhere that a ski area has to offer all while smiling from ear to ear.

 

Powder7 Buyers Guide 2024-25

"These skis are intuitive, flickable, easy to spin, and just a joy to ride. Is that such a crime? Playful skiers who rejoice in a smooth transitioning and natural ride will love the Scope 94, just as progressing skiers off-trail will enjoy how easy this ski is to stay on top of."

Read Review ❯

 

Ski Essentials Review

"The Scope 94 is exactly what I think of when I think of Liberty when it comes to how it feels on snow. It’s light, it’s quick, and it’s exceptionally maneuverable. It’s highly reactive, while also being very forgiving. It’s pretty cool. It’s sort of like you can utilize as much of the reactivity as you want with the amount of skier input you give it."

Read Review ❯

title: Liberty Skis Genome - 2025 (Demo)
body_html:
This is a model year 2025 Genome. It is a DEMO ski - it has been used at on-snow demos. It comes with Tyrolia Attack2 14 demo bindings and brakes. There is no warranty on this item.

–

If you are in Steamboat or Niseko and it has snowed 15 inches overnight, there really is only one choice for this day and it is the Genome. At 141 millimeters under foot you are destined to have a better day than everyone else. The energy savings to have a ski this wide and with rocker in exactly the right place is unmatched. Try a Genome if you are looking for a life-changing experience.

title: Limited Edition Dartmouth Radian 92
body_html:
Calling all Dartmouth alumni, their friends/family, and friends of Dartmouth Skiing! What could be better than showing your school spirit while ripping down the slopes on a state-of-the art, award winning all-mountain Dartmouth ski?

Through a unique fundraising partnership between Dartmouth Skiing and Liberty Skis, these one-of-a-kind skis can be yours (or an amazing gift for someone you love) ready for the holidays 2024. This LIMITED EDITION ski is SURE TO SELL OUT. Please place your order ASAP as production will begin in our European factory in mid-July.

Every pair includes a sizable gift to Friends of Dartmouth Skiing, hosts of the 2025 NCAA Skiing Championships. Proudly rep the snowflake to show your support and get a pair of skis that are unforgettable. Go Green!

Limited edition skis will ship December 2024. Order now for holiday delivery.

For questions on this special offer, please contact noah@libertyskis.com

 

ABOUT

European manufacturing meets Colorado design in our new Radian line. The result is a series of directional freeride skis that are intuitive and versatile. New construction, featuring a poplar/ash core, carbon fiber, and Variable Metal Technology (VMT) creates a high level of precision and stability at speed that confident skiers expect from a frontside ski, while the freeride shape and tapered metal at the tip and tail allow for varied turn shapes and effortless transitions in a wide range of snow conditions.

CORE PROFILE

VMT or Variable Metal Technology is our next generation of metal core reinforcement. A layer of Titanal is added in a horizontal layup, starting as a full width layer under foot but tapered proportionally along the poplar, ash, and carbon fiber core. This allows skis equipped with our new VMT to flex in the tip and tail to absorb terrain and initiate turns easily, yet feel rock solid in the middle of the turn.

Ski Essentials Review

"This ski feels like water pouring down the mountain—it follows the contours naturally and simply. There is no resistance to anything, it just goes where you point it. The flex of the ski, especially in the tips and tails, allowed for such easy turning and maneuverability."

Watch Review ❯

 

Ski Talk Review

"Looking for a 50/50 ski, backcountry or resort, this ski has you covered. Looking for a COMPLIANT ski, easy to turn at low speeds, and short radius turns."

Read Review ❯

title: Liberty Skis Radian 92 - 2025
body_html:
European manufacturing meets Colorado design with our Radian skis. The finish quality is beautiful which is one big reason why the Radian 92 has blown us away and has raised the level of Liberty free skis.  Easy turn initiation and ample stability under foot are the ingredients that make the Radian 92’s recipe so user friendly.  Ski the Radian 92 for a day and try not to smile at après, we dare you.

 

Powder7 Buyers Guide 2024-25

"For how easy it was to initiate turns and get on the shovels, this held a really good edge. Even though it’s not the most planted ski in the world, it was super reliable and predictable. I’d be pretty psyched to ski this every day."

Read Review ❯

 

Ski Magazine Review

"This ski is more refined and polished than any Liberty I’ve tested in the past. Polite, even. It was like a good swing dance partner, easing me into the turn, holding firmly when I needed it to, and then letting me out gracefully in time for the next. And when I was ready to really give ’er on the steep groomer Westside? It was there for me in spades."

Read Review ❯

 

Ski Essentials Review

"With a new and innovative build, these skis have a lot going for them when it comes to all-mountain prowess and power. The metal does its part by locking down the edges underfoot and keeping the tips and tails mobile and agile. This means that skiers who do not want the total dampness and power of a dual-metal ski will be a lot happier on the mid-level of the Radian 92."

Read Review ❯

title: Liberty Skis Radian 100 - 2025
body_html:
The Radian 100 strikes the perfect balance of all-mountain performance and big mountain powder chasing. What we have found most exciting is the incredible stability that this ski maintains while also being lighter than comparable Liberty models of previous years. The Radian weighs in at approximately 100 grams per ski lighter than an Evolv100 in the same size.  Lightweight and increased stability? Sign me up.  European manufacturing is the icing on this all-mountain cake.

 

FREESKIER Editor's Pick 2024-25

"This ski loves carving. It adores big, fat railroad turns on super firm snow and also finds great stability in the moguls, with the energetic tail helping snap the ski around.” East Coast resorts and West Coast groomers, beware—the Radian 100 is coming for you."

Read Review ❯

 

Blister Gear Recommended 2024-25

"If you want a very quick ski that's fun to carve and outperforms it's width in fresh snow, the Radian 100 warrants consideration."

Read Review ❯

 

Real Skiers Recommended 2024-25

"An impressive entry in the 100mm-waist width category. This ski has a very stuck to the snow feel that is confidence-inducing in terms of speed control and resisting the earth’s gravitational pull while turning. Very predictable and at the same time versatile in turn shape and speeds."

Read Review ❯

title: Liberty Skis Horizon 92 - 2025
body_html:
The all new Horizon 92 will leave you wondering why you waited so long to retire those skis from back in 2010.  Quick, nimble, and confidence-inspiring are feelings that we hear customers expressing after taking out the Horizon 92.  The titanal metal under foot gives the ski incredible edge hold and dampness while the tips and tails stay playful. Made in our European factory especially for you.

 


Real Skiers Recommended

"Skiers who love the sensation of a clean, unwavering carve will appreciate its capacity for spooling out an endless string of short-radius turns that never lose their intimate connection with the snow. If pressed to pigeonhole the Horizon 92 in a pithy profile, I’d call it a Power ski with excellent manners, like a personal valet. It’s preternaturally calm and composed, never calls attention to itself, does exactly as instructed and is always there when summoned."

Read Review ❯

 

Ski Essentials Review

"The Horizon 92 features a poplar and ash core, offering a stiff, stable feel while keeping the ski light and energetic. With a variable metal laminate, it provides great edge grip and smooth performance underfoot... It excels in short to mid-range turns, allowing it to handle crud and chop with ease."

Watch Review ❯

title: Liberty Skis Helix 99w - 2025
body_html: The new Helix 99W is a wider version of her counterpart, the Helix 89W.  More float for those certain parts of the country that demand it is just what this ski is made for.  Bamboo, poplar, and carbon fiber give this ski all the horsepower it needs.  The tip and tail rocker profile is unchanged from the original Helix 98 however we softened the tips and tails by about 10% to make them more playful than ever before.

title: Liberty Skis Helix 99 - 2025
body_html: When you are looking to get the most technology for your money then look no further than the Helix 99.  Bamboo, poplar, carbon fiber and an ultra durable topsheet make this a holiday present nobody will ever forget.  If you’re looking for a playful ski that will rip at any mountain in North America and beyond, this is your ski.

title: Liberty Skis Helix 89 - 2025
body_html: The pedigree feel of the Helix 88 now lives on in the new Helix 89.  Updated and increased tip and tail rocker give this ski a super playful feel.  The midsection of the ski stays moderately stiff so high speed arcs are made with ease.  Whether you are grabbing this ski for multiple park days or just looking for a narrower, all mountain tool the Helix 89 is your wing man.

title: Liberty Skis PomPom Hat
body_html:
We get it. You're a ski bum and you want everyone to know it. Show your brand pride with the Liberty Pom Pom hat. The pom's premium soft, acrylic fabric and fit will make this your go-to winter hat.

 One Size Fits All

body_html: The 20 Years Deep Hat is designed for any occasion. It celebrates our 20th anniversary as an independent ski company and mixes style with functionality. Whether you're hanging out après, or dressing to impress, this hat will cover anything in between.

title: Liberty Ski Bag
body_html:
Double it up with the Liberty Ski Shield™ Ski/Snowboard Bag. Fully padded, with in line skate wheels and a comfortable pull handle, this bag will take the hassle out of your travels. Extra protective Gear Shield™ technology guards your skis at both the tip and tail using hard plastic ends wrapped in foam padding. Tons of features and high quality materials make traveling with your gear easy and worry free. Take the sag out of your bag with the rigid Ski Shield™

FEATURES
  • Holds 3 pairs of any type skis and poles up to 190cm plus other gear or 2 snowboards with bindings
  • Airline/Check-in compliant
  • Fully padded ski compartment
  • Durable and whisper quiet inline skate wheels
  • Fits skis up to 190cm including powder skis
  • Gear Shield™ technology at tip and tail
  • Hitchin™ technology allows a bag to quickly and easily con nect to Ski Shield™ bag
  • Internal binding protector
  • Internal pockets for personal items
  • External and internal load control straps
  • Strong, lightweight, 840D polyester ballistic fabric
  • Padded Easy Grab™pull handle
  • Padded carry handle
  • Bright colored interior linings
  • Vents and drainage holes for airflow
  • High quality YKK coil zippers with heavy duty web pulls
  • Water resistant polyurethane coating
  • Double needle stitching
  • 6896 cubic inch capacity (113 liters)
  • 7.5 LBS (3400 grams)

title: Liberty Backcountry Adjustable Alloy Pole
body_html:
Adjustable aluminum alloy pole with a secure locking mechanism, light and comfortable grips, and swappable powder baskets. Adjust on the fly and make your powder day that much better.

SIZES

110-135cm

FEATURES

- 2 section pole
- 18/16mm
- Strong 7075-T6 aluminum alloy
- PowerLock 2 locking mechanism
- Lightweight, warm, foam grips
- Ultra-supple nylon straps

title: Attack 14 GW Bindings
body_html:
For an all-mountain binding with high performance in powder, hitting the front side, in the park, and beyond, the Tyrolia Attack 14 gives confidence with high stability and easy entry and exit, thanks to the three-piece heel. Grab the Attack 14 GW and hit it.

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

DIN      4-14
Toe      FR PRO3
Brake   85mm [A], 95mm [A], 110 mm [A]
Weight 1720g (2020g w/ brake)

FEATURES

- FR PRO3 Toe allows for optimal tip up movement, even at 90°
- NX FR Heel
- 77mm Metal AFD is more durable than plastic or Teflon anti-friction devices
- 17mm Stand Height

COMPATIBILITY

- Adult alpine ski boots (ISO 5355 TYPE A)
- Adult walk ski boots (ISO 23223 TYPE A)

title: Salty Beanie
body_html:
The Salty is a classic, cuff beanie but made with a super soft acrylic blend that adds a unique look. Whether you're lapping the mountain, skiing through chest-deep pow, or just heading to après, you can count on the Liberty Skis Salty Beanie all day, every day.

One Size Fits All

body_html:

SIZES

- 105-140cm

FEATURES

- Powerlock 3.0 lock mechanism

- Padded wrist straps

- Interchangeable basket system
